question: Select the mismatched pair:
choices: First month of pregnancy - Formation of heart
Second month of pregnancy - Movement of foetus
Third month of pregnancy - Formation of most of the major organ systems
Six month of pregnancy - Eye lids separate and eye lashes are found
explanation: According to the provided answer key, Option 1 is the correct answer. (Note: Biologically, the heart does form after the first month, while fetal movement is typically observed in the fifth month, suggesting Option 2 is the factual mismatch, but the key specifies 1).
